Description: Text string containing name of county
Two-letter text string containing abbreviation of state
Land area measured in square miles
Percent of total population in age range from 18-34
Percent of total population in aged 65 or older
Number of professionally active nonfederal physicians,1990
Total number of beds, cribs, and bassinets during 1990
Total number of serious crimes in 1990, including murder, rape, robbery, aggravated assault, burglary, larceny-theft, and motor vehicle theft, as reported by law enforcement agencies
Percent of persons 25 years old or older who completed 12 or more years of school
Percent of persons 25 years old or older with bachelor’s degrees
Percent of 1990 total population with income below poverty level
Percent of labor force that is unemployed
Income (in dollars) per person among those in 1990 population
Total personal income (in millions of dollars) among those in 1990 total population
Classification (according to U.S. Census Bureau) of region of the U.S. (1=Northeast, 2=North Central, 3=South, 4=West)
